title: Promotional material: Key facts about apprenticeships
text:
21 February 2017, see all updates Applies to: Facts, figures and statistics about apprenticeships. Documents HTML Details 
Interesting key facts on the many benefits of apprenticeships for young people, employers and the economy for our partners and employers to use at events and in communications to help to spread the word on apprenticeships. Document information
